name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminder Pro: It helps users stay organized.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a productivity tool that helps users stay organized. It allows users to set reminders for tasks and events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a productivity tool that helps users stay organized and on top of their to-do list. It allows users to set reminders for tasks and events, and receive notifications at the specified time. Users can also add notes and categorize tasks for easy tracking and management. The extension can be easily accessed from the browser and syncs across all devices. With this extension, users can stay on top of their tasks and never miss a deadline again.
